headline: Should Investors Rethink CBRE After Its 32% Surge and Recent Market Momentum in 2025?
summary: If you are following real estate stocks, you have probably noticed CBRE Group catching more eyes lately. Whether you are already holding shares or are considering taking a position, deciding what to do next can feel like a big call. Over the last year, the stock has posted an impressive 32.2% gain, building on a striking 138.0% return over three years and a massive 248.7% rise in five. Even after gaining ground, it has managed to add another 25.6% since the start of this year alone. The past...
